title: 110_s3372
content: Saver's Bonus Act of 2007 sic - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to develop programs to: (1) match deposits made by low-income individuals into certain savings accounts, (2) deposit tax refunds electronically into savings accounts. And (3) allow individual taxpayers to purchase US savings bonds on their federal income tax returns. Requires the Commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) to notify low-income taxpayers of their eligibility for the saver's bonus and of their options under this Act.
